thawada 1917 aprel masa eksath janapadaya thamagema mulopayayika ha mulyamaya uthsukayan aaraksha kara ganima sandaha yuddhayata elambaena kalhi, mema yuddhaya kerenne “lokaya pa්rajathantha්rawadaya sandaha aaraksha sahitha sthanayak bawata path kirima” sandaha yayi pa්rakasha karamin eya me begal kandata thawath musawak ek kaleya.
